adm:constants.name: name
adm:constants.description: The human-readable name of the ADM.

adm:constants.name: organization
adm:constants.description: The name of the issuing organization of the ADM.

adm:report-templates.name: endpointReport
adm:report-templates.description: This is all known endpoint information

adm:controls.name: reset
adm:controls.description: Resets the counters associated with the engine and updates the last reset time for the span to be the time when this control was run.
